content:
If they accept my linkedin request to connect, this is the cadence I use:

LinkedIn Message:

Hi {{first\_name}}, 
Thanks for accepting my invite to connect. 
As mentioned, we just completed a 2 year project with Spire taking them through their IPO, new market entry into Australia and other milestones. We sourced over 23,000 candidates with an 80%+ close rate across multiple tech and sales roles in Europe, the US, Singapore and Australia. This success is being created into a case study, which once completed I will be happy to share. 
I see that {{company\_natural}} is hiring, and as a Spacetech startup, hiring top talent can be fiercely competitive, especially for technical roles unique to your industry. We understand that first hand. 
I would like to introduce myself, and learn more about {{company\_natural}}. How is next week for you to meet? Feel free to pick a time on my calendar, or share options that work better for you. 
Calendar: https://calendly.com/buzelan/30min  
Looking forward, Jonathan

Email 1: Thanks for connecting - Now, here's why.

Hi {{first\_name}},
Following-up on my message over LinkedIn. Thanks again for connecting on LinkedIn. 
As mentioned, my team just wrapped up a big project with Spire, a Spactech start-up. As a co-founder, I understand that one of the biggest challenges we face is finding the right people to grow our start-ups, and in Spacetech that can be tough. 
I see you're hiring and I have ideas to streamline your recruiting, if you are up to a chat. 

Let me introduce you to RecruitrLabs, a talent acquisition partner designed to function as an internal resource to your team. We take away the time-consuming portion of recruiting, helping Spacetech startups like yours scale their hiring. We helped make some hires at Spire across a wide range of Spacetech roles in Europe, the US, and AIPAC region.

When are you free for intro chat this week? (Here is my my Calendar if you prefer picking a time)
Best regards,

EMAIL 2: 🚀 Scale your team

Hi {{first\_name}},
I am following to share more on how I can help ramp up hiring at {{company\_natural}}.
We do this through two ways:
SOURCE, a subscription-based sourcing-as-a-service that helps to boost your team's talent sourcing reach; and 
PRO, our embedded recruiter on-demand solution that gets a recruitment team onboard when you need it for as long as you need it. 

What sets RecruitrLabs apart is our embedded approach, allowing us to work alongside you and your team as an in-house partner to help you meet your hiring deadlines. Our SOURCE and PRO models give your team access to flexible and scalable resources that adapt to your hiring needs and workflow. And our data-driven approach takes the guesswork out of recruitment, enabling smarter decision-making and helping to align with the goals of founders and their hiring managers. 
And, with access to over 1 billion indexed profiles and having curated over 550,000 unique profiles, we have the resources to help you find the perfect candidates for your open roles. 
Let me know if you're interested in learning more about how we can help you hire without delay. 
Feel free to select a day and time on my Calendar to chat. 

Best,

EMAIL 3: Question

Hi {{first\_name}},
Is your team still looking to fill those critical roles? Do you have a deadline for these hires? 

If that is the case, we should talk. I have clients that are easily seeing a 30% increase in candidate pipeline, and a 50% reduction in time-to-hire with our support. 

We have worked with over 600 clients and completed over 2700 projects to date. 

Like I said, I have ideas to streamline your recruiting. 

Let's schedule a call to discuss in more detail and see how we can help the hiring managers on your team meet their hiring deadlines. 
Here is my Calendar. If you don't see a time that works for you, let me know. Happy to work around your schedule, best I can. 

Looking forward,
EMAIL 4: Hi {{first\_name}}, Can we set that time? 

Hi {{first\_name}},

I see you still have a number of roles open. Is their 1 or 2 that are critical than all the others? Could your team benefit from hiring for those openings? 

Let me get straight to it.
Our clients have seen a 30% increase in qualified candidate pipelines and a 50% reduction in time-to-hire with our two main solutions: SOURCE, our subscription-based sourcing-as-a-service that helps to boost your team's talent sourcing reach, and PRO is our embedded recruiter on-demand solution that gets a recruitment team onboard when you need it for as long as you need it.

Try me out. Here is my Calendar.

Best,

EMAIL 5: Introduction
Hi {{first\_name}},
I sent you a LinkedIn request to connect and introduce myself. 


We did connect, but the "introduce myself" part still hasn't happened. 



As a co-founder working with Spacetech companies, I understand the unique challenge of finding the right talent. That's why I reached out to introduce myself. I can streamline your recruiting and get you the talent you are looking for. 

We are NOT a recruitment agency, and when you work with me, I promise you will never be charged those crazy 20% to 30% per hire agency Fees.

I understand the importance of having a flexible and predictable recruitment budget. That's why we offer a subscription-based model. This means you can grow your team with unlimited hiring and plan your recruitment budget without worrying about unexpected fees.



Let's set a time to meet. When is it good for you this week or next? 


Best,
